item.title: HTML Speculation Rules API Tutorial: 6 Lines of Code for Instant Page Loads
item.description: Complete guide to HTML5 Speculation Rules API for prefetching and prerendering web pages. Achieve 90% faster page loads with 6 lines of HTML code. Includes Chrome 121+ implementation and cross-browser compatibility solutions.

item.title: Interviewer: How do you test your code? Complete JavaScript Testing & Debugging Guide
item.description: Master JavaScript testing and debugging techniques, from unit testing to E2E testing, from console.log to breakpoint debugging, become a professional developer that impresses interviewers

item.title: Is React Doomed? Silicon Valley CTOs Are Secretly Jumping Ship...
item.description: Revealing why CTOs from 24 top tech companies are abandoning React: an in-depth analysis of five key truths including performance bottlenecks, development efficiency, and talent costs.

item.title: Bun vs Rust Performance Showdown: The Newcomer vs The Veteran
item.description: Which is faster, Bun or Rust? This article uses a real-world URL shortener service benchmark to compare Bun (Elysia) and Rust (Actix) in throughput, latency, and developer experience, helping you choose the right tech stack.
